verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] been under fire for weeks over its new " zero - tolerance " policy . On Sunday , a handful of reporters were permitted to tour Border Patrol 's largest processing facility in McAllen , Texas — known as " Ursula " — where many of the family separations are taking place .
